name: Toby
description: Toby LOVES ice cream but would like your help getting it from behind this weird clear barrier.

name: Quinn
description: Quinn had a great time at her family reunion, she didn't like the grass appetizers but she was happy to see everyone.

name: Otto
description: Otto wanted to make sure that your order was right but don't be surprise to just find crumbs inside the bag.

name: Hershey
description: Hershey wanted to know if he went through the tree, if he would appear in a wonderland of his own.

name: Brix
description: Brix will make the house of your dreams but it may take him a few years as he is a one-man construction company.

name: Ozzy
description: Ozzy has had enough of the customers at work today, he is ready to go home and cuddle up right next to you.

name: Mystery
description: Mystery is ready to go shopping, she has had her eye on these new toys that dropped this morning.

name: Henry
description: Henry is ready to move in but wants you to know to be careful with his stick collection, they're very fragile.

name: Hazel
description: Hazel can't believe she just made a new little friend that can fly, she wonders if her friend can give her lessons.

name: Archie
description: Archie is ready to skateboard alongside with you, but make sure to keep up because this boi right here will surprise you.

name: Hooper
description: Hopper is ready for volleyball tryouts, just look at that powerful stance, he is most definitely making the team.

name: Mali
description: Mali wants to show off her aura, she wants you to know that she is the most powerful amongst ALL dogs.

name: Molly
description: Molly is proud to be your pilot for today and you should rest assured that this will be the most wildest ride ever!

name: Scottie
description: Scottie went on his afternoon walk and made sure to get all his steps in, he took advantage to chase all the squirrels he encountered.

name: Razzo
description: Razzo has been sending these flirty selfies to all your contacts. (FYI, you have now been given a 12% raise.)
